backDesc: I beseech you for help. / He besought forgiveness. / He has besought kindness on many occasions.

frontDesc: Dia dikelilingi masalah keuangan. / Dia mengepung target-targetnya. / Dia sudah menimpakan berbagai tantangan pada mereka.
backDesc: He was beset by financial problems. / He beset his targets. / He has beset them with challenges.

frontDesc: Orang tua menegur anak itu karena ketidakpatuhannya. / Dia menegurnya di depan umum. / Dia sudah sering menegurnya atas perilakunya.
backDesc: Parents chided the child for disobedience. / He chided him publicly. / He has chidden him for his behavior.

frontDesc: Saya mengenakan pakaian untuk musim dingin. / Dia berpakaian dengan elegan. / Dia sudah pernah berpakaian mewah sebelumnya.
backDesc: I clothe myself for winter. / She clad herself elegantly. / She has clad herself in fine clothes before.

frontDesc: Saya bermimpi tentang liburan. / Dia bermimpi tentang sebuah perjalanan. / Dia sudah bermimpi untuk keliling dunia.
backDesc: I dream of vacations. / He dreamt of a trip. / He has dreamt about traveling the world.

frontDesc: Saya memberi makan anjing setiap hari. / Dia memberi makan burung-burung di kebun. / Dia sudah memberi mereka makan setiap pagi.
backDesc: I feed the dog every day. / She fed the birds in the garden. / She has fed them every morning.

frontDesc: Kemeja ini pas sekali di saya. / Dia cocok dalam tim itu. / Dia sudah menyesuaikan diri dengan baik sejak hari pertama.
backDesc: This shirt fits me perfectly. / He fit into the team. / He has fit in well since day one.

frontDesc: Saya lari menghindari hujan. / Dia melarikan diri dari rumah. / Dia sudah pernah melarikan diri dari situasi sulit sebelumnya.
backDesc: I flee from the rain. / She fled from home. / She has fled difficult situations before.

frontDesc: Saya melempar batu ke dalam air. / Dia melempar botol ke luar jendela. / Dia sudah pernah melempar barang saat marah.
backDesc: I fling a stone into the water. / He flung the bottle out the window. / He has flung objects in anger before.

frontDesc: Saya melarang merokok di dalam gedung. / Dia melarang anak-anak menonton TV. / Dia sudah beberapa kali melarang mereka.
backDesc: I forbid smoking in the building. / She forbade the children from watching TV. / She has forbidden them multiple times.

frontDesc: Saya meramalkan hujan untuk besok. / Dia meramalkan kenaikan harga. / Dia sudah meramalkan perubahan seperti itu dengan akurat.
backDesc: I forecast rain for tomorrow. / He forecast a price increase. / He has forecast such changes accurately.

frontDesc: Saya meninggalkan kebiasaan lama. / Dia meninggalkan mimpinya. / Dia sudah meninggalkan semuanya.
backDesc: I forsake old habits. / She forsook her dreams. / She has forsaken them all.

frontDesc: Saya berlutut di depan altar. / Dia berlutut sebagai tanda hormat. / Dia sudah berlutut di sana berkali-kali.
backDesc: I kneel before the altar. / He knelt in a gesture of respect. / He has knelt there many times.

frontDesc: Saya merajut sweter untuk musim dingin. / Dia merajut syal. / Dia sudah merajut banyak syal sebelumnya.
backDesc: I knit a sweater for winter. / She knitted a scarf. / She has knitted many scarves before.

frontDesc: Saya meletakkan buku di atas meja. / Dia meletakkan kunci di rak. / Dia sudah sering meletakkannya di sana.
backDesc: I lay the book on the table. / She laid the keys on the shelf. / She has laid them there many times.

frontDesc: Saya memimpin tim. / Dia memimpin perusahaan itu selama bertahun-tahun. / Dia sudah memimpin banyak proyek sukses.
backDesc: I lead the team. / He led the company for many years. / He has led numerous successful projects.

frontDesc: Saya membungkuk di atas buku. / Dia membungkuk di atas meja. / Dia sudah membungkuk di sana selama berjam-jam.
backDesc: I lean over the book. / He leant over the table. / He has leaned over it for hours.

frontDesc: Saya melompat di atas tali. / Dia melompati pagar. / Dia sudah melompati banyak rintangan.
backDesc: I leap on the rope. / He leapt over the fence. / He has leapt across many obstacles.

frontDesc: Saya menyalakan lampu ruangan. / Dia menyalakan lampu di malam hari. / Dia sudah menyalakannya setiap malam sejak saat itu.
backDesc: I light the room's light. / He lit the light in the evening. / He has lit it every night since then.

frontDesc: Saya melakukan kesalahan dalam perhitungan. / Dia salah menafsirkan keputusan itu. / Dia sudah beberapa kali salah menafsirkan niat orang lain.
backDesc: I mistake in the calculations. / He mistook the decision. / He has mistaken people's intentions before.

frontDesc: Saya memotong rumput di taman. / Dia memotong rumput kemarin. / Dia sudah sering memotongnya secara teratur.
backDesc: I mow the grass in the garden. / He mowed the lawn yesterday. / He has mown it regularly.

frontDesc: Saya mengatasi kesulitan setiap hari. / Dia mengatasi rasa takutnya. / Dia sudah mengatasi banyak rintangan.
backDesc: I overcome difficulties every day. / He overcame his fears. / He has overcome many obstacles.

frontDesc: Saya ikut serta dalam rapat. / Dia ikut serta dalam konferensi. / Dia sudah berpartisipasi dalam beberapa acara baru-baru ini.
backDesc: I partake in meetings. / He partook in the conference. / He has partaken in several events recently.

frontDesc: Saya memohon bantuan. / Dia memohon pengampunan. / Dia sudah sering memohon belas kasihan.
backDesc: I plead for help. / He pled for forgiveness. / He has pled for mercy many times.

frontDesc: Saya membuktikan bahwa saya tidak bersalah. / Dia membuktikan teorinya. / Dia sudah membuktikannya tanpa keraguan.
backDesc: I prove my innocence. / He proved his theory. / He has proven it beyond doubt.

frontDesc: Saya menggergaji kayu di bengkel. / Dia menggergaji papan untuk perahu baru. / Dia sudah menggergaji banyak kayu.
backDesc: I saw wood in the workshop. / He sawed planks for a new boat. / He has sawn many pieces of wood.

frontDesc: Saya mencari kunci di rumah. / Dia mencari solusi untuk masalah itu. / Dia sudah mencari jawaban di mana-mana.
backDesc: I seek the keys at home. / He sought a solution to the problem. / He has sought answers everywhere.

frontDesc: Saya menjahit pakaian di atelier saya. / Dia menjahit kemeja selama beberapa jam. / Dia sudah menjahit banyak pakaian.
backDesc: I sew clothes in my atelier. / He sewed a shirt for several hours. / He has sewn many garments.

frontDesc: Saya mencukur bulu domba di peternakan. / Dia mencukur bulu domba kemarin. / Dia sudah mencukur banyak domba musim ini.
backDesc: I shear sheep on the farm. / He sheared a sheep yesterday. / He has shorn many sheep this season.

frontDesc: Sweter saya menyusut setelah dicuci. / Sweter itu menyusut karena suhu tinggi. / Sweter itu sudah menyusut terlalu banyak.
backDesc: My sweater shrinks after washing. / It shrank in high temperature. / It has shrunk too much.

frontDesc: Saya membasmi tikus di ruang bawah tanah. / Dia membunuh monster di hutan. / Dia sudah membunuh banyak makhluk dalam ceritanya.
backDesc: I slay rodents in the basement. / He slew the monster in the forest. / He has slain many creatures in his stories.

frontDesc: Dapur itu bau makanan busuk. / Baunya semakin parah setelah hari panas. / Sudah bau selama berjam-jam.
backDesc: The kitchen stinks of rotten food. / It stank after a hot day. / It has stunk for hours.

frontDesc: Saya melangkah dengan percaya diri. / Dia melangkah cepat sehingga tiba tepat waktu. / Dia sudah melangkah melalui banyak tantangan.
backDesc: I stride with confidence. / He strode quickly, arriving on time. / He has stridden through many challenges.

frontDesc: Saya memukul bola ke arah gawang. / Dia memukul pintu dengan keras. / Dia sudah menimbulkan rasa takut pada lawan-lawannya.
backDesc: I strike the ball towards the goal. / He struck the door hard. / He has struck fear into his opponents.

frontDesc: Saya merangkai manik-manik pada seutas tali. / Dia menggantung lampu di dinding. / Dia sudah pernah merangkai dekorasi sebelumnya.
backDesc: I string beads on a string. / He strung the lamp on the wall. / He has strung decorations before.

frontDesc: Saya berusaha mencapai tujuan. / Dia berusaha meraih kesuksesan selama bertahun-tahun. / Dia sudah berusaha untuk mencapai puncak.
backDesc: I strive to achieve the goal. / He strove for success for years. / He has striven to reach the top.

frontDesc: Saya berayun di ayunan. / Dia berayun di balkon. / Dia sudah sering berayun di tali itu.
backDesc: I swing on the swing. / He swung on the balcony. / He has swung on that rope many times.

frontDesc: Saya merobek kertas untuk mencabiknya. / Dia merobek kanvas dengan pisau. / Dia sudah sering secara tidak sengaja merobek banyak kertas.
backDesc: I tear the paper to shred it. / He tore the canvas with a knife. / He has torn many papers accidentally.

frontDesc: Saya mendorong pintu itu untuk membukanya. / Dia mendorong pintu dengan keras. / Dia sudah pernah mendorongnya terbuka sebelumnya.
backDesc: I thrust the door to open it. / He thrust the door hard. / He has thrust it open before.

frontDesc: Saya melangkah hati-hati di lantai basah. / Dia melangkah dengan penuh percaya diri. / Dia sudah pernah melewati jalur ini sebelumnya.
backDesc: I tread carefully on the wet floor. / He trod with a confident stride. / He has trodden this path before.

frontDesc: Saya membatalkan gerakan yang saya buat. / Dia membatalkan perubahan dalam dokumen itu. / Dia sudah sepenuhnya membatalkannya.
backDesc: I undo the move I made. / He undid the changes in the document. / He has undone them completely.

frontDesc: Saya menenun syal dengan jarum rajut. / Dia menenun karpet di bengkelnya. / Dia sudah menenun beberapa karpet sekarang.
backDesc: I weave a scarf on the knitting needles. / He wove a rug in his workshop. / He has woven several rugs now.

frontDesc: Saya menangis karena sedih. / Dia menangis setelah putus. / Dia sudah meneteskan banyak air mata.
backDesc: I weep in sorrow. / He wept after the breakup. / He has wept many tears.

frontDesc: Saya memutar jam setiap pagi. / Dia menggulung tali menjadi gulungan. / Dia sudah menggulungnya dengan rapi.
backDesc: I wind the watch every morning. / He wound the strings into a tape. / He has wound them neatly.

frontDesc: Saya mundur dari diskusi. / Dia mengundurkan diri dari proyek itu. / Dia sudah sepenuhnya mundur.
backDesc: I withdraw from the discussion. / He withdrew from the project. / He has withdrawn completely.

frontDesc: Saya bertahan dalam kondisi sulit. / Dia bertahan menghadapi angin kencang. / Dia sudah bertahan melalui banyak badai.
backDesc: I withstand difficult conditions. / He withstood the strong wind. / He has withstood many storms.

frontDesc: Saya memeras handuk basah. / Dia memeras jus dari buah-buahan. / Dia sudah sering memeras banyak handuk.
backDesc: I wring out wet towels. / He wrung juice out of fruits. / He has wrung out many towels.

frontDesc: Saya membekukan makanan di dalam freezer. / Dia membekukan air untuk freezer. / Dia sudah membekukan cukup air untuk es.
backDesc: I freeze food in the freezer. / He froze water for the freezer. / He has frozen enough water for ice.

frontDesc: Saya menggantung gambar di dinding. / Dia menggantung lampu di ruangan. / Dia sudah menggantung banyak gambar di seluruh rumah.
backDesc: I hang a picture on the wall. / He hung the lamp in the room. / He has hung many pictures around the house.
